title: Iranian Climber Elnaz Rekabi Competes Without Hijab, Sparking Fear
description: Elnaz Rekabi flew back to Iran on Tuesday after competing in an international climbing competition without her hijab — breaching the Islamic Republic’s rules for women athletes.
dc:creator: Euan Ward and John Yoon
category: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
media:credit: Rhea Kang/Agence France-Presse, via International Federation of Sport Climbing
media:description: Elnaz Rekabi competing at the Asian Championships in Seoul, in a photo provided by the International Federation of Sport Climbing.
